org.apache.ignite.streamer.router

Class StreamerLocalEventRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.streamer.router.StreamerLocalEventRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamerEventRouter

    public class StreamerLocalEventRouter
extends Object
implements StreamerEventRouter
    Local router. Always routes event to local node.

    • Method Detail

      • route

        public <T> ClusterNode route(StreamerContext ctx,
                    String stageName,
                    T evt)
        Selects a node for given event that should be processed by a stage with given name.
        Specified by:
        route in interface StreamerEventRouter
        Parameters:
        ctx - Streamer context.
        stageName - Stage name.
        evt - Event to route.
        Returns:
        Node to route to. If this method returns null then the whole pipeline execution will be terminated. All running and ongoing stages for pipeline execution will be cancelled.

      • route

        public <T> Map<ClusterNode,Collection<T>> route(StreamerContext ctx,
                                       String stageName,
                                       Collection<T> evts)
        Selects a node for given events that should be processed by a stage with given name.
        Specified by:
        route in interface StreamerEventRouter
        Parameters:
        ctx - Streamer context.
        stageName - Stage name to route events.
        evts - Events.
        Returns:
        Events to node mapping. If this method returns null then the whole pipeline execution will be terminated. All running and ongoing stages for pipeline execution will be cancelled.
